content.en: Gearbox fault diagnosis: Researchers have been investigating various methods for assessing the health and diagnosing faults in gearboxes. These studies have found that algorithms play a crucial role in signal processing, feature extraction, and fault diagnosis. By using algorithms such as adaptive filtering techniques, Hilbert-Huang transform, and time-frequency analysis, researchers are able to extract fault features from vibration measurements and accurately monitor the condition of gearboxes.
content.da: Fejldiagnose af gearkasse: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige metoder til vurdering af tilstanden og diagnostisering af fejl i gearkasser. Disse studier har vist, at algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i signalbehandling, featureekstraktion og fejldiagnose. Ved at bruge algoritmer såsom adaptive filtreringsteknikker, Hilbert-Huang transform og tid-frekvensanalyse kan forskere udtrække fejlkarakteristika fra vibrationsmålinger og præcist overvåge gearkassens tilstand.
